Package com.googlecode.compressingcircularbuffers

Interface Summary
CompressionMethod A compression method defines how 2k adjacent samples get transformed into a single compressed value.
 

Class Summary
AveragingCompressionMethod Compresses by aggregating adjacent samples into averages.
CompressingCircularBuffer Maintains a compressed, fixed-memory-footprint, "sketch" (summary) of a sampled data sequence.
CompressingCircularBufferTester  
MaximizingCompressionMethod Compresses by replacing adjacent values with maximum thereof.
MinimizingCompressionMethod Compresses by replacing adjacent values with minimum thereof.
RandomSamplingCompressionMethod Compresses by replacing adjacent values with a random sample thereof.
SummingCompressionMethod Compresses by aggregating adjacent samples into their totals (sum).
ThinningCompressionMethod Compresses by simply eliminating intermediary values.
